title: Block
description: A slot that contains a set of recent transactions on a blockchain network. Each block contains data required to manage the blockchain, including an encrypted version of the previous block.

props.body: A slot that contains a set of recent transactions on a blockchain network. Each block contains data required to manage the blockchain, including an encrypted version of the previous block.
